name: Enchanted Woods
description:
Help reuniting Julian and Maverick in the deep Enchanted Woods. Try to survive in the woods by defeating the monsters.

How to play?

  • Use the right, left, jump and attack buttons
  • The player has 100 points of health score.
  • The player will lose 5 points of health score each time, if the enemy is encountered but not defeated.
  • Collect the golden coins and follow the golden trail in your journey.
  • Collect the blue jewels to upgrade to the next level.
  • Enjoy the victory at the end of the tenth level when Julian will finally find Maverick.
